mapper.select:
select data_id, cgid, nd, cgmc, sqjddw, sqdjh, startTime, endTime, cglx, zy, jdh, issczs, sbzt, jdjg, create_date, create_user_id, update_date, update_user_id, status, remarks, hth, xmmc, rwly, define1, define2, define3, define4, define5, define6, tfm_type_id, type_code, type_name, parent_id, parent_code, is_parent, type_index from index_out_appraisal where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and cgid like '%${cgid}%'
and nd like '%${nd}%'
and cgmc like '%${cgmc}%'
and sqjddw like '%${sqjddw}%'
and sqdjh like '%${sqdjh}%'
and startTime like '%${starttime}%'
and endTime like '%${endtime}%'
and cglx like '%${cglx}%'
and zy like '%${zy}%'
and jdh like '%${jdh}%'
and issczs like '%${issczs}%'
and sbzt like '%${sbzt}%'
and jdjg like '%${jdjg}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user_id like '%${createUserId}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and update_user_id like '%${updateUserId}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and remarks like '%${remarks}%'
and hth like '%${hth}%'
and xmmc like '%${xmmc}%'
and rwly like '%${rwly}%'
and define1 like '%${define1}%'
and define2 like '%${define2}%'
and define3 like '%${define3}%'
and define4 like '%${define4}%'
and define5 like '%${define5}%'
and define6 like '%${define6}%'
and tfm_type_id like '%${tfmTypeId}%'
and type_code like '%${typeCode}%'
and type_name like '%${typeName}%'
and parent_id like '%${parentId}%'
and parent_code like '%${parentCode}%'
and is_parent like '%${isParent}%'
and type_index like '%${typeIndex}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
